rows.label: tlk70000062_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Even to a Gulan like me, the Grail's
attack on the Iiran capital city was a
tragedy.

rows.label: tlk70000062_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Of course the damage from the attack
itself was awful... But I'm worried
about the political implications, too.

rows.label: tlk70000062_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Superbia and Gula are on good
terms. But I know less about our
relationships with other places...

rows.label: tlk70000062_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Y'see, Gula is made up of a bunch
of different families, and that's what
our social structure is based around.

rows.label: tlk70000062_05_msg0005
rows.name:
All the family chiefs have their own way
of thinking, too. It can be tough to
establish and maintain consensus.

rows.label: tlk70000062_05_msg0006
rows.name:
I've got a bad feeling about what would
happen if other countries were to prod
at those brittle relationships too hard...
